name: taboola-recommendation-widget
description: Taboola recommendation widget - Frontend Engineering Home Assignment

scripts.serve:kill: powershell -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8000 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; npx http-server -p 8000 -c-1 -o"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.demo: npm run build && npm run serve
